text:
If there was ever a time for #vaccine advocacy, it's now. Millions of little ones are at risk of being left behind due to #COVID19. This #GivingTuesday I'm supporting @ShotAtLife to help ensure children everywhere get lifesaving immunizations. 
Join me: https://t.co/4xafYoVHhw https://t.co/cjkojJlQ5l
